data.text:
Innovation doesn‚Äôt appear out of thin air. When new technology changes the way we work and live, it‚Äôs the result of thousands of decisions made by optimistic people who are dedicated to challenging norms. Pedro Carrasco, Senior Manager of Operations at Munich Re Ventures, is one such person. We asked him how he achieved a 96% internal adoption rate for his firm‚Äôs modern tech stack, and he shared: - How to innovate your tech stack to prioritize efficiency and scalability with example use cases - How to build analytics into your reporting structure and leverage data within the Affinity platform - Best practices for driving firm-wide adoption of new technologies and the Affinity CRM Learn more. https://buff.ly/47UxZBk

üóØÔ∏è We are beyond thrilled to present to you our first wave of startups in our Exhibition. Let's welcome... üí° Synera, founded by Daniel Siegel, Dr. Moritz Maier, and Sebastian M√∂ller. Synera utilizes visual programming to automate engineering processes, facilitating agile hardware development and seamlessly integrating CAx tools while centralizing expertise within the organization. ‚öô Logistikbude, founded by Dr. Philipp H√ºning, Michael Koscharnyj, Patrik Elfert, and Jan M√∂ller. Their software simplifies and digitizes the management of reusable load carriers for businesses. Offering transparency on inventory and streamlining processes, their user-friendly platform minimizes repurchase rates and reduces personnel efforts through smart automation. üß† saasmetrix, founded by Marcel Banmann, Jerome Louis Fath, and Josua Kurt K√∂hler offers companies a solution to not only manage their SaaS costs but even save time and costs efficiently. We help you to identify unused licenses, onboard new employees easily, and gain back control of your SaaS management. saasmetrix is your must-have tool if you believe in more clarity, structure, and easy administration in your SaaS management. üå≥ Tanso Technologies is a software company founded by Till Wiechmann, Gyri Reiersen, and Lorenz Hetzel. It's specialized in climate intelligence solutions for industrial companies, offering services like Corporate Carbon Footprint (CCF) and ESG management for ESRS compliance. Trusted by leading German industrial firms and supported by the European Innovation Council (EIC) and top VC funds, TANSO is driving sustainable practices in the industry. Meet these 4 and many more on the 13th of June! Got your ticket yet? https://hubs.ly/Q02hn3X30 #startup #exhibition #hinterland24 #conference #bielefeld #foundersfoundation #tech

is #spacetech ready for investement ? The present economic slump has had an influence on investments in space technology, as it has on many other startup areas. However, total investment in the second quarter of 2023 totaled closed to $1bill. That was double that of the first quarter. The median deal size also doubled during that time. Many growth stage companies, such as Ursa Major, Constanellis Aerospace, and Astranis, raised $100 million or more According to Deloitte, the volume of data flowing between Earth and space will reach 500 exabytes by 2030. This represents a 14x increase over 2020. #spacetech , #financialforecasting , #investing , #venturecapital Investments in the satellite industry are expanding faster than those in the launch industry. reference - https://lnkd.in/gAWdVBVH

CALLING ALL TECH FOUNDERS! Check out this new evolution of a Reverse Pitch Challenge! We need moon-shot solutions to these large-scale problem areas! Register TODAY for The Company Lab (CO.LAB) and TennSMART‚Äôs inaugural Sustainable Mobility Reverse Pitch Challenge. Imagine a platform where you can gain exposure in one of the most dynamic sectors of our time. By participating in this challenge, you gain access to mentorship, unparalleled resources, and a vast network of industry experts eager to champion your startup. But that's just the tip of the iceberg. The real magic lies in the impact your startup can have on the sustainable mobility landscape. Whether it's ‚ö°streamlining supply chain routes, ‚ö°revolutionizing workforce turnover, ‚ö°powering the electrification of transportation, or ‚ö°diving into the world of quantum technology, this challenge is the gateway to groundbreaking solutions with real-world implications. Don't just be a part of the future ‚Äì be the force that shapes it. Register now: https://lnkd.in/eQtB6mfa

Sprind, Germany's federal agency for disruptive #innovation, is revolutionising the #funding of breakthrough technologies. While traditional programmes like Horizon Europe have lengthy application processes and bureaucratic hurdles, Sprind offers a faster and more flexible approach. Inspired by DARPA, Sprind focuses on challenge-based competitions where innovators tackle critical global problems, providing rapid funding decisions, often within days, and aiming for real-world impact rather than just meeting #grant requirements. In this way, its continuous competition model allows only the most promising projects to advance, bridging the gap for early-stage #technologies and empowering teams to adapt quickly. In just five years, Sprind has demonstrated that a fast, focused and flexible approach can redefine innovation in Europe, making it a powerful alternative to traditional funding models. Read the full article here: https://ow.ly/Hc8u50SKJ0H

This article provides a glimpse of our grit. We started FLUIX Pro by developing our patented turbulent liquid cooling technology to enable ultra efficient high performance computing. Although we received initial sales and grants, there was a larger problem to solve. (2019 - 2022) As we refined out approach with data center customers, we uncovered the energy problem and lack of insights & controls in these facilities. Inspired by the autonomous vehicle industry and with the growth of generative AI, we pivoted in tackling a much bigger problem. This is when FLUIX AI, with the help of our CTO Chase and our broader team! (2023 - Present) To learn more visit: https://www.fluix.ai/ Read the article below to learn more about our journey and the resources we leveraged and the help we received throughout our journey. Thank you to teknovation.biz and Katelyn Keenehan for highlighting our journey so far! #ai #pivot #business #journey #technology Shashank, #energy Kush, #cooling #datacenter #tennessee #automation #cleantech #energy #proptech #hvac #controls #criticalinfrastructure #buildings
